amendment.description: To provide funding for an Internet Crimes Against Children task force in Montana.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3041 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3041 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S2250-2251; text: CR S2250) To provide funding for an Internet Crimes Against Children task force in Montana.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3041 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3041 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
